main.name: Khalil Dabbah
main.description: I eat, sleep and build projects
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Khalil Dabbah, a student software engineer and full-stack developer with a strong passion for building impactful systems and continuously expanding my skills. Iâ€™ve worked on a variety of technical projects ranging from backend systems and databases to complete full-stack applications. Along the way, I discovered that I truly enjoy helping others grow and understand complex technical concepts in a simple, practical way. Through sharing knowledge, collaborating on projects, and creating real-world software solutions, I aim to inspire other developers to push beyond their limits and grow professionally. I focus on hands-on learning, real projects, and practical problem-solving to prepare for success in the tech industry. My goal is to keep learning, building, and contributing to meaningful projects that make a real difference.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me and let's connect

work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
